title.rendered: Amb. Adamu I. Lamuwa, on behalf of the Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Amb. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) launched the 4Ds Foreign Policy Sensitization Tour in Cairo, Egypt.

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Amb. Adamu I. Lamuwa, on behalf of the Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Amb. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) launched the 4Ds Foreign Policy Sensitization Tour in Cairo, Egypt on 13th January, 2024.
The event, which was attended by Representatives of the Nigerian Community in Cairo, provided the platform for engagement with the Community particularly, in the areas of welfare and safety.
The 4Ds Diplomacy comprise Democracy, Development, Demography and Diaspora.
